> icon文件放在什么地方呢? 直接贴这在个pull request吗? 在webui库里面??

PR到UI工程此目录：https://github.com/wu-sheng/sky-walking-ui/tree/master/src/main/resources/public/img/node
文件名称为Component名称，后缀为png。你可以添加后，在本次测试，应该拓扑上，应用的图标会改变。

貌似png文件的大小写不敏感的,有些图标是全部大写,有些是全部小写,有些是混合着,并没有与Component名称完全对上.

 而且spring和struct2的png还没加吧?

Could not reproduce this failure.
Please post your `mvn package` log. collect-remote and network module depends on grpc protoc util.

你好,是这样子的,我用proto的maven插件生成了java类后,并没有找到RemoteCommonServiceGrpc这个类
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8568508/30783790-9c44600e-a17b-11e7-9036-8c586ed8c309.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8568508/30783825-ffa238d8-a17b-11e7-81af-85bc5fc13915.png)
protobuf目录下应该有两个目录，java和grpc，这个类在grpc目录中。`RemoteCommonService.proto`文件中也明确定义了此服务。所以，请检查gRPC和maven环境，以及IDE设置。 另外，根据Travis-ci编译情况，此工程没有编译问题：https://travis-ci.org/wu-sheng/sky-walking

cc @ascrutae . From the sample codes, I think we have a chance to provide a plugin for this thread pool, which intercept the the parameter of `execute()`, and use the snapshot and override the `run()` to accomplish the propagation across thread. Also can avoid to dev a plugin for all `runnable` implementations, which is insane, and not realistic.
@wtj199101 请提供一下所使用的类库，以及对应的版本，谢谢。
@wtj199101 ThreadPoolTaskExecutor我印象中，应该是Spring的一部分。
I think that we can abstract parent class  and each sub class to fetch the request URL.
@clevertension This is an improvement. We can provide more plugins for these annotations.

Also we need this to support enhance one class with multi plugins. No just version reason, also match multi plugins. e.g. use several Spring annotation.

**Make sure `ClassEnhancePluginDefine` add new field and interface once.**

This is a high priority feature. Provide in 3.2.3

@IluckySi Thanks for your contribution first. Because of this possible byte-buddy bug. We can't merge or release this right now. These left us two choices:

1. xmemcached released a new version, we only support that.
1. byte-buddy support this, and we can release this. The best choice. @raphw Hope you can solve this for us.

So sorry for that, I only can keep this pr open, and wait for what is going to happen.

And @IluckySi , in this pr. You must provide these in the pr.

1. A simple application includes how are you using the library you instrument, source code repository is fine.
1. Screenshot for trace stack.
1. Screenshot for the Topological graph.  From this, you can see, you miss an icon for memcached in UI repository. You should send a linked pr.

yes。使用了spring boot  1.4.3.RELEASE  jdk1.8 @EnableAsync  开启异步支持后直接使用。这种线程池里面的线程执行时间和参数能通过agent方式得到吗？
@wtj199101 可以的，可以通过拦截你传入的Runnable接口的方法得到执行时间，和执行链路情况。但是参数需要你通过代码和agent交互才可以。我们需要提供一个新的plugin，才能支持你这种写法。

Besides codes review, which I have no time to do, the concern is about git commit logs. These is nothing important there, but this pr includes 8 commits. @IluckySi Since this is a relative simple pr, the commit log number should stay in 1. So please use `git rebase` in your branch.
